```javascript
        runHideOrShow: async () => {
            // Optimization: Check if there are any unprocessed cards first. If not, exit early.
            const cards = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.card}:not(.fab-helper-processed)`);
            if (cards.length === 0) {
                // Still update the count in case it was changed elsewhere, but don't re-run logic.
                const allHiddenCards = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.card}[style*="display: none"]`);
                if (State.hiddenThisPageCount !== allHiddenCards.length) {
                    State.hiddenThisPageCount = allHiddenCards.length;
                    UI.update();
                }
                return;
            }

            // ÈáçÁΩÆËÆ°Êï∞
            State.hiddenThisPageCount = 0;
            
            // Ëé∑ÂèñÊâÄÊúâÂ∞öÊú™Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÂç°Áâá
            const cardsArray = Array.from(cards);
            
            // Â¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÊñ∞Âç°ÁâáÈúÄË¶ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Êõ¥Êñ∞UIÂπ∂ËøîÂõû
            if (cardsArray.length === 0) {
                // ‰ªçÁÑ∂ÈúÄË¶ÅÊõ¥Êñ∞UI‰ª•Èò≤ËÆ°Êï∞Âú®ÂÖ∂‰ªñÂú∞ÊñπË¢´ÊîπÂèò
                const allHiddenCards = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.card}[style*="display: none"]`);
                State.hiddenThisPageCount = allHiddenCards.length;
                UI.update();
                return;
            }
            
            // È¢ÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºöÊâæÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâÈúÄË¶ÅÈöêËóèÁöÑÂç°Áâá
            const cardsToHide = [];
            const cardsToShow = [];
            
            for (const card of cardsArray) {
                const text = card.textContent || '';
                const link = card.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.cardLink);
                if (!link) continue;
                
                const url = link.href.split('?')[0];
                const isNativelySaved = [...Config.SAVED_TEXT_SET].some(s => text.includes(s));
                const isSessionCompleted = State.sessionCompleted.has(url);
                
                // Á°Æ‰øùÂ∞ÜÂ∑≤‰øùÂ≠ò‰ΩÜÊú™ËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑÈ°πÁõÆÊ∑ªÂä†Âà∞‰ºöËØùÂÆåÊàêÈõÜÂêà
                if (isNativelySaved && !isSessionCompleted) {
                    State.sessionCompleted.add(url);
                }
                
                // ÂàÜÁ±ªÂç°Áâá
                if (State.hideSaved && (isNativelySaved || isSessionCompleted)) {
                    cardsToHide.push(card);
                } else {
                    cardsToShow.push({card, isOwned: isNativelySaved || isSessionCompleted});
                }
            }
            
            // Êõ¥Êñ∞ÈöêËóèËÆ°Êï∞
            State.hiddenThisPageCount = cardsToHide.length;
            Utils.logger('info', `ÈúÄË¶ÅÈöêËóèÁöÑÂç°ÁâáÊÄªÊï∞: ${cardsToHide.length}`);
            
            // Â§ÑÁêÜÈúÄË¶ÅÈöêËóèÁöÑÂç°Áâá
            if (cardsToHide.length > 100) {
                // ÂØπ‰∫éÂ§ßÈáèÂç°ÁâáÔºåÂè™ÂØπÊúÄÂêé100‰∏™Ê∑ªÂä†Âª∂Ëøü
                const directHideCards = cardsToHide.slice(0, cardsToHide.length - 100);
                const delayHideCards = cardsToHide.slice(cardsToHide.length - 100);
                
                // Áõ¥Êé•ÈöêËóèÂ§ßÈÉ®ÂàÜÂç°Áâá
                directHideCards.forEach(card => {
                    card.style.display = 'none';
                });
                
                // ÂØπÊúÄÂêé100‰∏™Âç°ÁâáÊ∑ªÂä†Âª∂Ëøü
                for (let i = 0; i < delayHideCards.length; i++) {
                    delayHideCards[i].style.display = 'none';
                    delayHideCards[i].classList.add('fab-helper-processed'); // Ê†áËÆ∞‰∏∫Â∑≤Â§ÑÁêÜ
                    
                    // Ê∑ªÂä†Â∞èÂª∂Ëøü
                    if (i < delayHideCards.length - 1) {
                        const delay = Math.floor(Math.random() * 50) + 20; // Êõ¥Áü≠ÁöÑÂª∂Ëøü(20-70ms)
                        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delay));
                    }
                }
            } else {
                // ÂØπ‰∫éÂ∞ëÈáèÂç°ÁâáÔºåÂÖ®ÈÉ®Ê∑ªÂä†Âª∂Ëøü
                for (let i = 0; i < cardsToHide.length; i++) {
                    cardsToHide[i].style.display = 'none';
                    cardsToHide[i].classList.add('fab-helper-processed'); // Ê†áËÆ∞‰∏∫Â∑≤Â§ÑÁêÜ
                    
                    // Ê∑ªÂä†Â∞èÂª∂Ëøü
                    if (i < cardsToHide.length - 1) {
                        const delay = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 50; // 50-150msÂª∂Ëøü
                        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delay));
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // Â§ÑÁêÜÈúÄË¶ÅÊòæÁ§∫ÁöÑÂç°Áâá
            cardsToShow.forEach(({card, isOwned}) => {
                card.style.display = '';
                
                // Á°Æ‰øùÂ∑≤Êã•ÊúâÁöÑÈ°πÁõÆÂú®UI‰∏äÊúâÊ≠£Á°ÆÁöÑÊ†áËÆ∞
                if (isOwned) {
                    UI.applyOverlay(card, 'owned');
                } else {
                    // ÁßªÈô§‰ªª‰ΩïÁé∞ÊúâÁöÑË¶ÜÁõñÂ±Ç
                    const existing = card.querySelector('.fab-helper-overlay-v8');
                    if (existing) existing.remove();
                }
                card.classList.add('fab-helper-processed'); // Ê†áËÆ∞‰∏∫Â∑≤Â§ÑÁêÜ
            });
            
            // Êõ¥Êñ∞UIÊòæÁ§∫
            UI.update();
        },

        // --- NEW: Cooldown UI Logic ---
        initiateCooldownSequence: async () => {
            // 1. Memory: Remember current state
            State.wasExecutingBeforeCooldown = State.isExecuting;
            State.isCoolingDown = true;
            if (State.isExecuting) State.isExecuting = false; // Pause execution
            Utils.logger('error', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Rate limit detected. Initiating cooldown sequence...');

            // 2. Initial Cooldown
            let countdown = 60;
            const updateTimer = () => {
                if (State.UI.cooldownStatus) {
                    State.UI.cooldownStatus.innerHTML = `ÊúçÂä°Âô®ÈÄüÁéáÈôêÂà∂‰∏≠... Ê≠£Âú®ÂÜ∑Âç¥Ôºå${countdown}ÁßíÂêéÂ∞ùËØïÊÅ¢Â§ç„ÄÇ`;
                }
                UI.update();
            };
            updateTimer();
            const timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                countdown--;
                updateTimer();
                if (countdown <= 0) clearInterval(timerInterval);
            }, 1000);
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 60000));

            // 3. Recovery Verification
            let isRecovered = false;
            let retryCount = 0;
            const MAX_RETRIES = 10; // To prevent infinite loops
            while (!isRecovered && retryCount < MAX_RETRIES) {
                retryCount++;
                Utils.logger('info', `PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Verification attempt #${retryCount}... Sending canary request.`);
                if (State.UI.cooldownStatus) State.UI.cooldownStatus.innerHTML = `Ê≠£Âú®ÂèëÈÄÅÊé¢ÈíàËØ∑Ê±Ç‰ª•È™åËØÅÊúçÂä°Âô®Áä∂ÊÄÅ... (Â∞ùËØï ${retryCount}/${MAX_RETRIES})`;
                try {
                    const csrfToken = Utils.getCookie('fab_csrftoken');
                    const canaryUrl = 'https://www.fab.com/i/listings/search?count=1';
                    const response = await API.gmFetch({
                        method: 'GET',
                        url: canaryUrl,
                        headers: { 'x-csrftoken': csrfToken, 'x-requested-with': 'XMLHttpRequest' }
                    });
                    if (response.status === 200) {
                        isRecovered = true;
                        Utils.logger('info', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Verification successful! Server is responsive.');
                    } else {
                        Utils.logger('warn', `PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Verification failed. Server responded with ${response.status}. Retrying in 65s.`);
                        countdown = 65;
                        const retryTimerInterval = setInterval(() => {
                            countdown--;
                             if (State.UI.cooldownStatus) State.UI.cooldownStatus.innerHTML = `Êé¢ÈíàÂ§±Ë¥•ÔºåÊúçÂä°Âô®‰ªçÊúâÈôêÂà∂„ÄÇ${countdown}ÁßíÂêéÂÜçÊ¨°Â∞ùËØï...`;
                            if (countdown <= 0) clearInterval(retryTimerInterval);
                        }, 1000);
                        await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 65000));
                    }
                } catch (e) {
                     Utils.logger('error', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Canary request failed critically.', e);
                     await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 65000));
                }
            }

            // 4. Resurrection & Resumption
            State.isCoolingDown = false;
            Utils.logger('info', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Cooldown sequence complete.');
            if (isRecovered && State.wasExecutingBeforeCooldown) {
                Utils.logger('info', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Resuming previously active tasks...');
                State.isExecuting = true; // Restore state
                TaskRunner.startExecution();
            } else if (!isRecovered) {
                Utils.logger('error', 'PHOENIX PROTOCOL: Max verification retries reached. Server still unresponsive. Aborting auto-resume.');
            }
            State.wasExecutingBeforeCooldown = false; // Clear memory
            UI.update();
        },
    };
```

```javascript
    const Utils = {
        logger: (type, ...args) => {
            console[type](`${Config.SCRIPT_NAME}`, ...args);
            if (State.UI.logPanel) {
                const logEntry = document.createElement('div');
                logEntry.style.cssText = 'padding: 2px 4px; border-bottom: 1px solid #444; font-size: 11px;';
                const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString();
                logEntry.innerHTML = `<span style="color: #888;">[${timestamp}]</span> ${args.join(' ')}`;
                State.UI.logPanel.prepend(logEntry);
                while (State.UI.logPanel.children.length > 100) {
                    State.UI.logPanel.removeChild(State.UI.logPanel.lastChild);

        getText: (key, replacements = {}) => {
            let text = (Config.TEXTS[State.lang]?.[key]) || (Config.TEXTS['en']?.[key]) || '';
            for (const placeholder in replacements) {
                text = text.replace(`%${placeholder}%`, replacements[placeholder]);
            }
            return text;
        },
        detectLanguage: () => {
            State.lang = window.location.href.includes('/zh-cn/') ? 'zh' : 'en';

        waitForElement: (selector, timeout = 5000) => {
            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                const interval = setInterval(() => {
                    const element = document.querySelector(selector);
                    if (element) { clearInterval(interval); resolve(element); }
                }, 100);
                setTimeout(() => {
                    clearInterval(interval);
                    reject(new Error(`Timeout waiting for selector: ${selector}`));
                }, timeout);
            });
        },
        isElementInViewport: (el) => {
            if (!el) return false;
            const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
            return (
                rect.top >= 0 &&
                rect.left >= 0 &&
                rect.bottom <= (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight) &&
                rect.right <= (window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth)
            );
        },
        getCookie: (name) => {
            const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
            const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
            if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
            return null;
        },
        deepClick: (element) => {
            if (!element) return;
            setTimeout(() => {
                const pageWindow = typeof unsafeWindow !== 'undefined' ? unsafeWindow : window;
                Utils.logger('info', `Performing deep click on element: <${element.tagName.toLowerCase()} class="${element.className}">`);
                const pointerDownEvent = new PointerEvent('pointerdown', { view: pageWindow, bubbles: true, cancelable: true });
                const mouseDownEvent = new MouseEvent('mousedown', { view: pageWindow, bubbles: true, cancelable: true });
                const mouseUpEvent = new MouseEvent('mouseup', { view: pageWindow, bubbles: true, cancelable: true });
                element.dispatchEvent(pointerDownEvent);
                element.dispatchEvent(mouseDownEvent);
                element.dispatchEvent(mouseUpEvent);
                element.click();
            }, 50);
        },
        debounce(func, wait) {
            let timeout;
            return function executedFunction(...args) {
                const later = () => {
                    clearTimeout(timeout);
                    func(...args);
                };
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
            };

    const API = {
        gmFetch: (options) => {
            return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                GM_xmlhttpRequest({
                    anonymous: false,
                    ...options,
                    onload: (response) => {
                        if (options.url.includes('/i/users/me/listings-states') || options.url.includes('/i/listings/search')) {
                            NetworkRecorder.recordRequest(options.url, response.status, response.responseText);
                        }
                        resolve(response);
                    },
                    onerror: (error) => {
                        if (options.url.includes('/i/users/me/listings-states') || options.url.includes('/i/listings/search')) {
                             NetworkRecorder.recordRequest(options.url, error.status, error.responseText);
                        }
                        reject(new Error(`GM_xmlhttpRequest error: ${error.statusText || 'Unknown Error'}`));
                    },
                    ontimeout: () => reject(new Error('Request timed out.')),
                    onabort: () => reject(new Error('Request aborted.'))
                });
            });
        },
        checkOwnership: async (listingIds) => {
            const ownedMap = {};
            if (!listingIds || listingIds.length === 0) {
                return ownedMap;
            }
            const csrfToken = Utils.getCookie('fab_csrftoken');
            if (!csrfToken) {
                Utils.logger('error', 'CSRF token not found for ownership check.');
                return ownedMap;
            }
            const CHUNK_SIZE = 24;
            for (let i = 0; i < listingIds.length; i += CHUNK_SIZE) {
                const chunk = listingIds.slice(i, i + CHUNK_SIZE);
                const statesUrl = new URL('https://www.fab.com/i/users/me/listings-states');
                chunk.forEach(id => statesUrl.searchParams.append('listing_ids', id));
                try {
                    const response = await API.gmFetch({
                        method: 'GET',
                        url: statesUrl.href,
                        headers: {
                            'x-csrftoken': csrfToken,
                            'x-requested-with': 'XMLHttpRequest',
                            'Accept': 'application/json, text/plain, */*'
                        }
                    });
                    const statesData = JSON.parse(response.responseText);
                    statesData.forEach(item => {
                        if (item.acquired) {
                            ownedMap[item.uid] = true;
                        }
                    });
                } catch (error) {
                    Utils.logger('error', `Ownership check for a chunk failed:`, error);
                }
            }
            return ownedMap;
        },
    };

        },
        saveDone: () => GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.DONE, State.db.done),
        saveFailed: () => GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.FAILED, State.db.failed),
        saveHidePref: () => GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.HIDE, State.hideSaved),
        resetAllData: async () => {
            if (window.confirm('ÊÇ®Á°ÆÂÆöË¶ÅÊ∏ÖÁ©∫ÊâÄÊúâÊú¨Âú∞Â≠òÂÇ®ÁöÑËÑöÊú¨Êï∞ÊçÆÔºàÂ∑≤ÂÆåÊàê„ÄÅÂ§±Ë¥•ÂàóË°®ÔºâÂêóÔºüÂæÖÂäûÂàóË°®‰πü‰ºöË¢´Ê∏ÖÁ©∫„ÄÇÊ≠§Êìç‰Ωú‰∏çÂèØÈÄÜÔºÅ')) {
                State.db.todo = [];
                await GM_deleteValue(Config.DB_KEYS.DONE);
                await GM_deleteValue(Config.DB_KEYS.FAILED);
                State.db.done = [];
                State.db.failed = [];
                Utils.logger('info', 'ÊâÄÊúâËÑöÊú¨Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∑≤ÈáçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ');
                UI.removeAllOverlays();
                UI.update();
            }
        },
        isDone: (url) => {
            if (!url) return false;
            return State.db.done.includes(url.split('?')[0]);
        },
        isTodo: (url) => {
             if (!url) return false;
            const cleanUrl = url.split('?')[0];
            return State.db.todo.some(task => task.url === cleanUrl);
        },
        markAsDone: async (task) => {
            if (!task || !task.uid) return;

    const TaskRunner = {
        init: () => {
            GM_addValueChangeListener(Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_DONE, async (key, oldValue, newValue, remote) => {
                if (!newValue || !newValue.workerId) return;

                Utils.logger('info', `--- Log Report from Worker [${workerId.substring(0, 12)}] ---`);
                logs.forEach(log => Utils.logger('info', log));
                Utils.logger('info', '--- End Log Report ---');
                delete State.runningWorkers[workerId];
                State.activeWorkers--;

                if (success) {
                    State.executionCompletedTasks++;
                    State.sessionPursuitCompletedCount++;
                    if (State.hideSaved) {
                        runHideOrShow();
                    }
                } else {
                    State.executionFailedTasks++;
                }

                if (State.isSmartPursuitEnabled && State.sessionPursuitCompletedCount >= Config.SMART_PURSUIT_THRESHOLD) {
                    Utils.logger('info', `[Êô∫ËÉΩËøΩÂáª] Â∑≤ÂÆåÊàê ${State.sessionPursuitCompletedCount} ‰∏™‰ªªÂä°, ËææÂà∞ÈòàÂÄº! Ëá™Âä®Ëß¶ÂèëÊñ∞‰∏ÄËΩÆÊâ´Êèè...`);
                    State.sessionPursuitCompletedCount = 0;
                    TaskRunner.processPageWithApi({ autoAdd: true });
                }

                if (State.isExecuting) {
                    TaskRunner.executeBatch();
                }
                UI.update();
            });
            State.valueChangeListeners.push(Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_DONE);
        },
        startExecution: () => {
            if (State.isExecuting) {
                const newTotal = State.db.todo.length;
                if (newTotal > State.executionTotalTasks) {
                    Utils.logger('info', `‰ªªÂä°ÊâßË°å‰∏≠ÔºåÊñ∞‰ªªÂä°Â∑≤Ê∑ªÂä†„ÄÇÊÄª‰ªªÂä°Êï∞Êõ¥Êñ∞‰∏∫: ${newTotal}`);
                    State.executionTotalTasks = newTotal;
                    UI.update();
                } else {
                    Utils.logger('info', 'ÊâßË°åÂô®Â∑≤Âú®ËøêË°å‰∏≠ÔºåÊñ∞‰ªªÂä°Â∑≤Âä†ÂÖ•ÈòüÂàóÁ≠âÂæÖÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ');
                }
                return;
            }
            if (State.db.todo.length === 0) {
                Utils.logger('info', '"ÂæÖÂäû"Ê∏ÖÂçïÊòØÁ©∫ÁöÑÔºåÊó†ÈúÄÂêØÂä®„ÄÇ');

            }
            Utils.logger('info', `ÈòüÂàó‰∏≠Êúâ ${State.db.todo.length} ‰∏™‰ªªÂä°ÔºåÂç≥Â∞ÜÂºÄÂßãÊâßË°å...`);
            State.isExecuting = true;

                Utils.logger('info', 'ÊâßË°åÂ∑≤Áî±Áî®Êà∑ÊâãÂä®ÂÅúÊ≠¢„ÄÇ');
            } else {
                TaskRunner.startExecution();
            }
            UI.update();
        },
        toggleHideSaved: async () => {

            document.querySelectorAll('.fab-helper-processed').forEach(card => {
                card.classList.remove('fab-helper-processed');
            });
            Utils.logger('info', 'Âº∫Âà∂ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂà∑Êñ∞ÔºöÊâÄÊúâÂç°ÁâáÁöÑ"Â∑≤Â§ÑÁêÜ"Áä∂ÊÄÅÂ∑≤Ë¢´ÈáçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ');
            runHideOrShow();
        },
        refreshVisibleStates: async () => {

        },
        processPageWithApi: async (options = {}) => {
            if (State.isScanning) {
                Utils.logger('warn', 'Êâ´ÊèèÂ∑≤Âú®ËøõË°å‰∏≠ÔºåÊú¨Ê¨°Ëß¶ÂèëÂ∑≤ÂøΩÁï•„ÄÇ');
                return 0;
            }
            State.isScanning = true;
            try {
                const { autoAdd = false, onlyVisible = true } = options;
                Utils.logger('info', Utils.getText('log_recon_start'));
                const cardSelector = Config.SELECTORS.CARD;
                const linkSelector = Config.SELECTORS.CARD_LINK;
                let cards = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(cardSelector));
                if (onlyVisible) {
                    cards = cards.filter(card => Utils.isElementInViewport(card));
                }
                if (cards.length === 0) {
                    Utils.logger('info', 'Âú®ÂèØËßÜÂå∫ÂüüÂÜÖÊ≤°ÊúâÂèëÁé∞Êñ∞ÁöÑÈ°πÁõÆÂç°Áâá„ÄÇ');
                    return 0;
                }
                Utils.logger('info', `[Êú¨Âú∞Êâ´Êèè] Ê≠£Âú®Ê£ÄÊü• ${cards.length} ‰∏™ÂèØËßÅÈ°πÁõÆ...`);
                const newItems = [];
                cards.forEach(card => {
                    const link = card.querySelector(linkSelector);
                    if (!link) return;
                    const url = link.href.split('?')[0];
                    const listingId = url.split('/listings/')[1];
                    const isBeingProcessed = Object.values(State.runningWorkers).some(worker => worker.task.url === url);
                    const cardText = card.textContent || '';
                    const isNativelyOwned = [...Config.SAVED_TEXT_SET].some(s => cardText.includes(s));
                    if (listingId && !Database.isDone(url) && !Database.isTodo(url) && !isNativelyOwned && !isBeingProcessed) {
                        const titleElement = card.querySelector('a[href*="/listings/"] > div');
                        const name = titleElement ? titleElement.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown Task';
                        const task = { name: name, url: url, type: 'detail', uid: listingId };
                        newItems.push(task);

                if (autoAdd && newItems.length > 0) {
                    State.db.todo.push(...newItems);

                    UI.update();
                }
                Utils.logger('info', `Êú¨Âú∞Êâ´ÊèèÂÆåÊàê„ÄÇÂèëÁé∞ ${newItems.length} ‰∏™Êñ∞È°πÁõÆ„ÄÇ`);
                return newItems.length;

                await GM_setValue(workerId, { task });

    // --- Ê†∏ÂøÉÈÄªËæëÂå∫ (Standalone Core Logic) ---

    function runHideOrShow() {
        const cards = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.CARD}:not(.fab-helper-processed)`);
        if (cards.length === 0) return;

        Utils.logger('info', `Ê≠£Âú®Â§ÑÁêÜ ${cards.length} ‰∏™ÂèØËßÅÂç°ÁâáÁöÑÁä∂ÊÄÅ...`);
        let hiddenOnThisRun = 0;
        let visibleOnThisRun = 0;

        cards.forEach(card => {
            const link = card.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.CARD_LINK);
            if (!link) {
                card.classList.add('fab-helper-processed');
                return;
            }
            const url = link.href.split('?')[0];
            const text = card.textContent || '';
            const isNativelySaved = [...Config.SAVED_TEXT_SET].some(s => text.includes(s));
            const isKnownDone = Database.isDone(url);

            if (State.hideSaved && (isNativelySaved || isKnownDone)) {
                card.style.display = 'none';
                hiddenOnThisRun++;
            } else {
                card.style.display = '';
                visibleOnThisRun++;
            }
            card.classList.add('fab-helper-processed');
        });

        // Update total hidden count based on a fresh query, not incremental, to avoid errors
        State.hiddenThisPageCount = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.CARD}[style*="display: none"]`).length;
        Utils.logger('info', `Â§ÑÁêÜÂÆåÊàê„ÄÇÊú¨Ê¨°ÈöêËóè: ${hiddenOnThisRun}, ÊòæÁ§∫: ${visibleOnThisRun}„ÄÇÈ°µÈù¢ÊÄªÈöêËóèÊï∞: ${State.hiddenThisPageCount}`);
        UI.update();
    }

    function setupObservers() {
        if (State.mainObserver) {
            State.mainObserver.disconnect();
        }

        const debouncedCardObserverHandler = Utils.debounce(() => {
            Utils.logger('info', `Ê£ÄÊµãÂà∞È°µÈù¢ÂÜÖÂÆπÂèòÂåñÔºåÂª∂Ëøü500msÂêéÂ§ÑÁêÜ...`);
            runHideOrShow();
        }, 500);

        State.mainObserver = new MutationObserver((mutationsList) => {
            for (const mutation of mutationsList) {
                if (mutation.type === 'childList' && mutation.addedNodes.length > 0) {
                    debouncedCardObserverHandler();
                    return;
                }
            }
        });

        Utils.waitForElement(Config.SELECTORS.CONTENT_CONTAINER).then(container => {
            State.mainObserver.observe(container, { childList: true, subtree: true });
            Utils.logger('info', '‰∏ªÂÜÖÂÆπÁõëËßÜÂô®Â∑≤ÂêØÂä®„ÄÇ');
        }).catch(err => {
            Utils.logger('error', 'Êó†Ê≥ïÊâæÂà∞‰∏ªÂÜÖÂÆπÂÆπÂô®ÔºåÁõëËßÜÂô®ÂêØÂä®Â§±Ë¥•„ÄÇ', err);
        });
    }

    // --- ‰∏ªÊâßË°åÂáΩÊï∞ (Main Execution) ---
    async function main() {
        if (new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).has('workerId')) {
            TaskRunner.processDetailPage();
            return;
        }

        Utils.detectLanguage();
        Utils.cleanup();

        await Database.load();

        // Initialize all modules that don't depend on the DOM being ready
        UI.create();
        TaskRunner.init();
        // NetworkFilter.init(); // Uncomment if needed
        // NetworkRecorder.init(); // Uncomment if needed
        // NetworkAnalyzer.init(); // Uncomment if needed
        PagePatcher.init();

        Utils.logger('info', Utils.getText('log_init'));

        setTimeout(() => {
            runHideOrShow();
            setupObservers();
        }, 3000);
    }

    // --- Script Entry Point ---
    main().catch(error => {
        console.error(`${Config.SCRIPT_NAME} a critical error occurred during initialization:`, error);
    });

})();
```

```javascript
        },
        sleep: (ms) => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms)),
        getText: (key) => (Config.TEXTS[State.lang]?.[key]) || (Config.TEXTS['en']?.[key]) || `_${key}_`,
        detectLanguage: () => {
            State.lang = window.location.href.includes('/zh-cn/') ? 'zh' : 'en';
        },
        getTaskInfoFromElement: (element) => {
            const link = element.querySelector('a[href*="/listings/"]');
            if (!link) return null;
            const url = link.href.split('?')[0];
            const titleElement = element.querySelector('.card-item-title, h1');
            const name = titleElement ? titleElement.textContent.trim() : 'Unknown Asset';
            return { name, url };
        },
        isNativelyOwned: (element) => {
            if (element.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.OWNED_INDICATOR)) return true;
            const cardText = element.textContent || '';
            return [...Config.OWNED_TEXT_SET].some(s => cardText.includes(s));
        },
        cleanup: () => {
            if (State.mainObserver) State.mainObserver.disconnect();
            if (State.spaObserver) State.spaObserver.disconnect();
            State.valueChangeListeners.forEach(id => { try { GM_removeValueChangeListener(id); } catch (e) { /* ignore */ } });
            State.valueChangeListeners = [];
            const oldContainer = document.getElementById(Config.UI_CONTAINER_ID);
            if (oldContainer) oldContainer.remove();
            const oldStyle = document.querySelector('style[data-fab-helper-style]');
            if(oldStyle) oldStyle.remove();
        },
    };

    // --- Ê®°ÂùóÂõõ: Êï∞ÊçÆÂ∫ì (Database) ---
    const Database = {
        load: async () => {
            State.db.done = await GM_getValue(Config.DB_KEYS.DONE, []);
            State.db.failed = await GM_getValue(Config.DB_KEYS.FAILED, []);
            State.hideSaved = await GM_getValue(Config.DB_KEYS.HIDE, false);
            Utils.logger('info', `DB loaded. Owned: ${State.db.done.length}, Failed: ${State.db.failed.length}`);
        },
        save: async () => {
            await GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.DONE, State.db.done);
            await GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.FAILED, State.db.failed);
        },
        saveHidePref: () => GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.HIDE, State.hideSaved),
        isDone: (url) => State.db.done.includes(url),
        isFailed: (url) => State.db.failed.some(t => t.url === url),
        markAsDone: async (task) => {
            if (!Database.isDone(task.url)) {
                State.db.done.push(task.url);
                const taskIndex = State.db.failed.findIndex(f => f.url === task.url);
                if (taskIndex > -1) State.db.failed.splice(taskIndex, 1);
                await Database.save();
            }
        },
        markAsFailed: async (task) => {
            if (!Database.isFailed(task.url)) {
                State.db.failed.push(task);
                await Database.save();
            }
        },
    };

    // --- Ê®°Âùó‰∫î: UIÁïåÈù¢ (User Interface) ---
    const UI = {
        create: () => {
            Utils.cleanup();
            GM_addStyle(UI.getStyles());
            const container = document.createElement('div');
            container.id = Config.UI_CONTAINER_ID;
            document.body.appendChild(container);
            State.UI.container = container;
            UI.render();
        },
        render: () => {
            const { todo, done, failed } = State.db;
            const t = Utils.getText;
            const execText = State.isExecuting ? t('executing') : (State.isScanning ? t('scanning') : t('execute'));

            const html = `
                <div class="fab-header">Fab Helper <strong>v2.0.0</strong></div>
                <div class="fab-stats">
                    <div><span>${todo.length}</span>${t('todo')}</div>
                    <div><span>${done.length}</span>${t('added')}</div>
                    <div><span>${failed.length}</span>${t('failed')}</div>
                    <div><span>${State.hiddenThisPageCount}</span>${t('hidden')}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="fab-actions">
                    <button id="fab-exec-btn" class="${State.isExecuting ? 'active' : ''}" ${State.isScanning ? 'disabled' : ''}>${execText}</button>
                    <button id="fab-hide-btn">${State.hideSaved ? t('show') : t('hide')}</button>
                    <button id="fab-sync-btn">${t('refresh')}</button>
                </div>
            `;
            State.UI.container.innerHTML = html;
            UI.addEventListeners();
        },
        update: () => {
            if (State.UI.container) UI.render();
        },
        addEventListeners: () => {
            State.UI.container.querySelector('#fab-exec-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
                State.isExecuting ? TaskRunner.stop() : TaskRunner.start();
            });
            State.UI.container.querySelector('#fab-hide-btn').addEventListener('click', async () => {
                State.hideSaved = !State.hideSaved;
                await Database.saveHidePref();
                PagePatcher.run(true);
            });
             State.UI.container.querySelector('#fab-sync-btn').addEventListener('click', async () => {
                await Database.load();
                await PagePatcher.run(true);
            });
        },
        createOverlay: (element, type) => {
            UI.removeOverlay(element);
            const overlay = document.createElement('div');
            overlay.className = `fab-item-overlay fab-overlay-${type}`;
            const text = type === 'owned' ? `‚úî ${Utils.getText('added')}` : `‚úñ ${Utils.getText('failed')}`;
            overlay.innerHTML = `<span>${text}</span>`;
            element.appendChild(overlay);
        },
        removeOverlay: (element) => {
            const existing = element.querySelector('.fab-item-overlay');
            if (existing) existing.remove();
        },
        getStyles: () => `
            #${Config.UI_CONTAINER_ID} { position: fixed; bottom: 20px; right: 20px; width: 280px; background: #282c34; color: #abb2bf; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); font-family: sans-serif; z-index: 9999; overflow: hidden; }
            .fab-header { padding: 10px; background: #3c4049; text-align: center; font-size: 14px; }
            .fab-stats { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 10px; padding: 12px; }
            .fab-stats div { background: #32363f; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; font-size: 12px; }
            .fab-stats span { display: block; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; color: #61afef; }
            .fab-actions { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; padding: 0 12px 12px 12px; gap: 8px; }
            .fab-actions button { background: #4b515d; color: #fff; border: none; padding: 10px; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.2s; font-size: 13px; }
            .fab-actions button#fab-exec-btn { grid-column: 1 / -1; background: #61afef; font-weight: bold; }
            .fab-actions button#fab-exec-btn.active { background: #e06c75; }
            .fab-actions button:disabled { background: #555; cursor: not-allowed; }
            .fab-item-overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; color: white; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 8px; pointer-events: none; }
            .fab-overlay-owned { background: rgba(28, 115, 41, 0.7); }
            .fab-overlay-failed { background: rgba(139, 0, 0, 0.7); }
        `,
    };

    // --- Ê®°ÂùóÂÖ≠: ‰ªªÂä°ÊâßË°åÂô® (Task Runner) ---
    const TaskRunner = {
        init: () => {
            const listenerId = GM_addValueChangeListener(Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_DONE, TaskRunner.handleWorkerCompletion);
            State.valueChangeListeners.push(listenerId);
        },
        start: async () => {
            if (State.isExecuting || State.isScanning) return;
            State.isExecuting = true;
            await TaskRunner.scanForTasks();
            TaskRunner.dispatchTasks();
            UI.update();
        },
        stop: () => {
            State.isExecuting = false;
            State.db.todo = [];
            UI.update();
        },
        scanForTasks: async () => {
            if (State.isScanning) return;
            State.isScanning = true;
            UI.update();
            try {
                const items = document.querySelectorAll(Config.SELECTORS.ITEM_CARD);
                for (const item of items) {
                    const task = Utils.getTaskInfoFromElement(item);
                    if (task && !Database.isDone(task.url) && !Database.isFailed(task.url) && !State.db.todo.some(t => t.url === task.url)) {
                        const isFree = [...Config.FREE_TEXT_SET].some(text => (item.textContent || '').includes(text));
                        if (isFree) State.db.todo.push(task);
                    }
                }
                Utils.logger('info', `Scan complete. Found ${State.db.todo.length} tasks.`);
            } finally {
                State.isScanning = false;
                UI.update();
            }
        },
        dispatchTasks: () => {
            if (!State.isExecuting) return;
            while (State.activeWorkers < Config.MAX_WORKERS && State.db.todo.length > 0) {
                State.activeWorkers++;
                const task = State.db.todo.shift();
                const workerId = `${Date.now()}_${Math.random()}`;
                State.runningWorkers[workerId] = { task, startTime: Date.now() };

                (async () => {
                    await GM_setValue(`${Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_PAYLOAD_PREFIX}${workerId}`, { task });
                    GM_openInTab(`${task.url}?workerId=${workerId}`, { active: false, setParent: true });
                })();
            }
            UI.update();
        },
        handleWorkerCompletion: async (key, oldValue, newValue) => {
            if (!newValue || !newValue.workerId) return;

            const { workerId, success, task } = newValue;
            delete State.runningWorkers[workerId];
            State.activeWorkers = Math.max(0, State.activeWorkers - 1);

            if (success) await Database.markAsDone(task);
            else await Database.markAsFailed(task);
            
            await GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_DONE, null); // Clear the signal
            await PagePatcher.run(true);
            TaskRunner.dispatchTasks(); // Continue the loop
        },
    };

    // --- Ê®°Âùó‰∏É: Â∑•‰ΩúÂçïÂÖÉ (Worker Logic) ---
    const Worker = {
        init: async (workerId) => {
            const payloadKey = `${Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_PAYLOAD_PREFIX}${workerId}`;
            const payload = await GM_getValue(payloadKey);
            await GM_deleteValue(payloadKey);

            if (!payload || !payload.task) return window.close();

            let success = false;
            try {
                await Utils.sleep(2000); // Wait for page to fully render
                if (Utils.isNativelyOwned(document.body)) {
                    success = true;
                    throw new Error("ALREADY_OWNED");
                }
                const actionButton = [...document.querySelectorAll('button')].find(btn =>
                    btn.textContent.includes('Add to my library') || btn.textContent.includes('Ê∑ªÂä†Âà∞ÊàëÁöÑÂ∫ì')
                );
                if (!actionButton) throw new Error('Could not find acquisition button.');

                actionButton.click();
                await Utils.sleep(2000);

                const licensePopup = document.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.LICENSE_POPUP);
                if (licensePopup) {
                    const standardLicense = [...licensePopup.querySelectorAll(Config.SELECTORS.LICENSE_OPTION)]
                        .find(opt => opt.textContent.includes(Config.STANDARD_LICENSE_TEXT));
                    if(standardLicense) {
                        standardLicense.click();
                        await Utils.sleep(500);
                        const confirmButton = licensePopup.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.LICENSE_CONFIRM_BUTTON);
                        if (confirmButton && !confirmButton.disabled) confirmButton.click();
                        else throw new Error('License confirm button not found or disabled.');
                    } else {
                        throw new Error('Standard License option not found.');
                    }
                }
                // Wait for UI to update to "Owned" state
                await new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
                    const interval = setInterval(() => {
                        if (Utils.isNativelyOwned(document.body)) {
                            clearInterval(interval);
                            resolve();
                        }
                    }, 500);
                    setTimeout(() => { clearInterval(interval); reject(new Error('Timeout waiting for ownership confirmation.')); }, 10000);
                });
                success = true;
            } catch (error) {
                if (error.message !== "ALREADY_OWNED") {
                    Utils.logger('error', `Worker failed: ${error.message}`);
                    success = false;
                }
            } finally {
                await GM_setValue(Config.DB_KEYS.WORKER_DONE, { workerId, success, task: payload.task });
                await Utils.sleep(250);
                window.close();
            }
        },
    };

    // --- Ê®°ÂùóÂÖ´: È°µÈù¢‰øÆË°•‰∏éËßÇÂØü (Page Patcher & Observer) ---
    const PagePatcher = {
        run: async (force = false) => {
            if (!force && Date.now() - State.lastHideShowRun < 500) return;
            State.lastHideShowRun = Date.now();

            const items = document.querySelectorAll(Config.SELECTORS.ITEM_CARD);
            if (items.length === 0) return;

            for (const item of items) {
                const task = Utils.getTaskInfoFromElement(item);
                if (!task || !task.url) continue;

                const isOwned = Database.isDone(task.url) || Utils.isNativelyOwned(item);
                const isFailed = Database.isFailed(task.url);

                if (isOwned) {
                    UI.removeOverlay(item);
                    if (State.hideSaved) item.style.display = 'none';
                    else {
                        item.style.display = '';
                        UI.createOverlay(item, 'owned');
                    }
                } else if (isFailed) {
                    item.style.display = '';
                    UI.createOverlay(item, 'failed');
                } else {
                    item.style.display = '';
                    UI.removeOverlay(item);
                }
            }
            State.hiddenThisPageCount = document.querySelectorAll(`${Config.SELECTORS.ITEM_CARD}[style*="display: none"]`).length;
            UI.update();
        },
    };

    // --- Ê®°Âùó‰πù: Ê†∏ÂøÉÂàùÂßãÂåñ (Core Initialization) ---
    const Initializer = {
        init: () => {
            const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
            const workerId = urlParams.get('workerId');
            if (workerId) {
                Worker.init(workerId);
            } else {
                Initializer.initMainPage();
            }
        },
        initMainPage: async () => {
            Utils.detectLanguage();
            await Database.load();
            UI.create();
            TaskRunner.init();
            Initializer.startObservers();
            await PagePatcher.run(true);
        },
        startObservers: () => {
            // Observer for infinite scroll
            const contentNode = document.querySelector(Config.SELECTORS.CONTENT_CONTAINER);
            if (contentNode) {
                State.mainObserver = new MutationObserver(() => {
                    PagePatcher.run();
                    if(State.isExecuting) TaskRunner.scanForTasks();
                });
                State.mainObserver.observe(contentNode, { childList: true, subtree: true });
            } else {
                setTimeout(Initializer.startObservers, 1000); // Retry if not found
                return;
            }
            // Observer for SPA navigation
            let lastUrl = location.href;
            State.spaObserver = new MutationObserver(() => {
                const url = location.href;
                if (url !== lastUrl) {
                    lastUrl = url;
                    setTimeout(() => PagePatcher.run(true), 500);
                }
            });
            State.spaObserver.observe(document.body, { subtree: true, childList: true });
        }
    };

    // --- Script Entry Point ---
    Initializer.init();

})();
```
